Articles.Content:
Hey everybody im climatix

Yesterday i finally bought KSP after playing the demo for a few weeks. I really like the game and im sure that it has a bright future

Edit: Can anyone help me with updating? i know this isnt the right place but i wont make a new thread, it says: Update error. Couldnt unzip the latest update, do you have sufficient disk space? I cant see more text because the window small. I have like 300gb of free disk space, i moved the KSP folder to C:/Games. I download the update fine but when it starts installing it gives this error, any suggestions?

Welcome, you din\'t put the full version over the demo, i hope. And my game is not in C, is in another partition. What antivirus do you have ? Check if the antivirus allows you that the game will connect to the net, for updates.

Welcome, you din\'t put the full version over the demo, i hope. And my game is not in C, is in another partition. What antivirus do you have ? Check if the antivirus allows you that the game will connect to the net, for updates.

I downloaded the whole game v 15 from the store and i deleted the demo before it, my antivirus is avast, im sure its not the antivirus because i can download the update but when it starts to unzip the update then it gives that error.
Here i made a screenshot of the error:

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

You\'re more likely to get help by posting your issue in the Support forum. Don\'t worry about starting a new topic there, that\'s what it\'s for.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
